summary: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by ghosts on Christmas Eve.
cast: Kelsey Grammer|Jesse L. Martin|Jane Krakowski|Jennifer Love Hewitt|Geraldine Chaplin|Jason Alexander|Brian Bedford|Claire Moore|Ruthie Henshall|Steven Miller|Edward Gower|Jacob Collier|Linzi Hateley|Julian Ovenden|Julie Alannagh-Brighten|Sheila Reid|Ian McLarnon|Emily Deamer|Joseph Tremain|Alan Ruscoe|Leah-Verity White|Joshua Wilmott|Patrick David|Gus Corrado|Will Collyer|Karen Sieber|Beth Curry|Martyn Ellis|Olivia Stephanie North|Jenny Galloway|Máté Haumann|Mike Kelly|John Rado|Gay Soper|Dave Willetts
title: A Christmas Carol
